21.description: Shields your champion for 115-455 (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.
21.name: Barrier

3.description: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 30%, their Armor and Magic Resist by 10, and their damage dealt by 40% for 2.5 seconds.
3.name: Exhaust

2.description: Reveals a small area of the map for your team for 5 seconds.
2.name: Clairvoyance

1.description: Removes all disables and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.
1.name: Cleanse

7.description: Restores 90-345 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Movement Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.
7.name: Heal

30.description: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.
30.name: To the King!

6.description: Your champion can move through units and has 27% increased Movement Speed for 10 seconds
6.name: Ghost

32.description: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.
32.name: Mark

4.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
4.name: Flash

31.description: Throw a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.
31.name: Poro Toss

17.description: Allied Turret: Grants massive regeneration for 8 seconds. Enemy Turret: Reduces damage dealt by 80% for 8 seconds.
17.name: Garrison

13.description: Restores 40% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 40% of their maximum Mana
13.name: Clarity

14.description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.
14.name: Ignite

11.description: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target epic or large monster or enemy minion.
11.name: Smite

12.description: After channeling for 3.5 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied structure, minion, or ward.
12.name: Teleport
